item.title: 私募股权投资及信贷业绩强劲，Blackstone 第一季度利润上升
item.description: 受私募股权投资和信贷业务资产销售收入增加的推动，Blackstone 周四公布第一季度利润大增 11%。【原文：Blackstone posted an 11% jump in first-quarter profit on Thursday, driven by higher proceeds from asset sales across its private equity and credit businesses.】

item.title: Global Payments 将以 227 亿美元收购 Worldpay
item.description: 金融科技公司 Global Payments 周四表示，将以 227 亿美元的价格从竞争对手 FIS 和投资公司 GTCR 手中收购支付处理器 Worldpay。【原文：Fintech company Global Payments said on Thursday it would buy payments processor Worldpay from rival FIS and investment company GTCR for $22.7 billion.】

item.title: 礼来药片在后期试验中使体重减轻 7.9%，股价大涨
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly）周四称，在一项后期试验中，其试验性药片orforglipron的最高剂量可使体重减轻近8%，并降低了超重2型糖尿病患者的血糖。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Thursday its experimental pill, orforglipron, led to a weight loss of nearly 8% at the highest dose and lowered blood sugar for overweight patients with type 2 diabetes in a late-stage trial.】

item.title: 投资银行和交易业务疲软导致 Truist 第一季度利润下降
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）严厉的贸易政策导致投资银行和交易部门业绩疲软，Truist Financial 周四公布第一季度利润下降。【原文：Truist Financial reported a fall in first-quarter profit on Thursday due to weakness in its investment banking and trading unit amid U.S. President Donald Trump's whiplash trade policies.】

item.title: 关税将引发美国经济大幅放缓；经济衰退几率跃升至 45%：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社调查的经济学家认为，美国激进的关税政策将引发今明两年美国经济大幅放缓，未来12个月经济衰退的概率中值将接近50%。【原文：An aggressive U.S. tariff policy will trigger a significant slowdown in the U.S. economy this year and next, with the median probability of recession in the next 12 months approaching 50%, according to economists polled by Reuters.】

item.title: LVMH 股东同意伯纳德-阿尔诺继续担任首席执行官直至 85 岁
item.description: 路威酩轩集团（LVMH）股东周四投票决定，允许 76 岁的伯纳德-阿诺特（Bernard Arnault）继续执掌全球最大的奢侈品集团，直至 85 岁。【原文：LVMH shareholders on Thursday voted to allow Bernard Arnault, 76, to remain at the helm of the world's largest luxury group until he's 85.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美联储鹰派转折，欧洲央行将放宽政策
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: LVMH 首席执行官表示，乔纳森-安德森（Jonathan Anderson）将为迪奥男装设计 6 月系列
item.description: 乔纳森-安德森（Jonathan Anderson）将为迪奥男装设计 6 月系列，LVMH 集团首席执行官贝尔纳-阿诺特（Bernard Arnault）周四在集团股东年度会议上表示。【原文：Jonathan Anderson will create the June collection for Dior Men's Fashion, LVMH CEO Bernard Arnault said on Thursday at the group's annual meeting with shareholders.】

item.title: 投资者对中国美国存托凭证退市的担忧再起
item.description: 随着世界两大经济体之间针锋相对的贸易战蔓延到金融领域，投资者对中国公司可能被强制从美国交易所退市的担忧再次出现。【原文：Investor concerns over the possible forced de-listing of Chinese companies from U.S. exchanges reemerged as the tit-for-tat trade war between the world's two largest economies spread to the financial sector.】

item.title: 独家报道马斯克的 SpaceX 公司是建造特朗普 "金顶 "导弹防御系统的领跑者
item.description: 六位知情人士透露，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）和两家合作伙伴已成为赢得唐纳德-特朗普总统的 "金顶 "导弹防御盾关键部分的领跑者。【原文：Elon Musk's SpaceX and two partners have emerged as frontrunners to win a crucial part of President Donald Trump's "Golden Dome" missile defense shield, six people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美股期货在大跌后反弹，日本贸易谈判成为焦点
item.description: 美国股指期货周四上涨，原因是投资者对本周最后一个交易日美日之间的关税谈判表示谨慎欢迎，在上一交易日大幅下跌后收复了一些失地。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Thursday, as investors cautiously welcomed tariff talks between the U.S. and Japan on the final trading day of the week, recovering some ground after sharp losses in the previous session.】

item.title: 联合健康（UnitedHealth）因医疗成本上升下调预期，股价下跌
item.description: 美国联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）周四下调了年度利润预期，原因是该保险公司预计将面临来自以下方面的更高成本【原文：UnitedHealth Group cut its annual profit forecast on Thursday in anticipation of higher costs for the insurer from】

item.title: 雷诺董事长塞纳尔将退出日产董事会
item.description: 雷诺董事长让-多米尼克-塞纳尔（Jean-Dominique Senard）将从日产董事会卸任，这家日本汽车制造商周四表示，公司正在应对业绩下滑问题。【原文：Renault Chairman Jean-Dominique Senard is to step down from Nissan's board of directors, the Japanese automaker said on Thursday, as the company tackles its declining performance.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称福特将召回超过 12.3 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周四表示，福特汽车公司将在美国召回123,611辆汽车，原因是液体泄漏可能会降低制动性能并增加停车距离。【原文：Ford Motor is recalling 123,611 vehicles in the U.S. due to a fluid leak that could reduce braking performance and increase stopping distance, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Thursday.】

item.title: LVMH 首席执行官：2025 年开局良好，但从 3 月起经济动荡导致形势恶化
item.description: 法国奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）负责人周四表示，今年开局良好，但由于与关税有关的经济动荡，从三月份开始情况有所恶化。【原文：The year started well but worsened from March due to economic turmoil linked to tariffs, the head of French luxury group LVMH said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国发布指南促进金融数据跨境流动
item.description: 中国央行周四宣布，中国已发布指导方针，以促进中外金融机构数据更高效、更标准化地跨境流动。【原文：China has released guidelines to facilitate more efficient and standardised cross-border flows of Chinese and foreign financial institutions' data, the central bank announced on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道日本财务大臣 "深切关注 "特朗普关税影响
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）周四表示，日本对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易关税对全球经济造成的影响 "深感忧虑"，这是在两国开始贸易谈判之际日本政府发出的最强烈警告。【原文：Japan is "deeply concerned" over global economic fallout from U.S. President Donald Trump's trade tariffs, Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato said on Thursday in the government's strongest warning yet as the two nations began trade talks.】

item.title: 据中国国家媒体报道，英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋周四抵达北京
item.description: 与中国国家广播公司 CCTV 有关的社交媒体账户 "玉渊潭天 "称，英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋于周四抵达北京。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang arrived in Beijing on Thursday, said Yuyuan Tantian, a social media account associated with Chinese state broadcaster CCTV.】

item.title: 消息人士称，日本普利司通将债券发行额减半以上，至 3.5 亿美元
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，日本普利司通已将计划发行的债券价值减半以上，约为 500 亿日元（约合 3.5056 亿美元）。【原文：Japan's Bridgestone has more than halved the value of a planned bond offering to around 50 billion yen ($350.56 million), two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中国依靠人工智能进行教育改革
item.description: 中国政府在周三发布的一份官方文件中表示，随着中国对教育进行全面改革，中国将把人工智能（AI）应用纳入教学工作、教科书和学校课程。【原文：China will integrate artificial intelligence (AI) applications into teaching efforts, textbooks and the school curriculum as it moves to overhaul education, authorities said in an official paper released on Wednesday.】

item.title: OVHCloud 首席执行官：欧洲企业在贸易战中重新考虑云计算服务提供商的选择
item.description: 欧洲领先的数据中心提供商 OVHCloud 在四大洲运营着 43 个设施，其首席执行官周四表示，全球贸易紧张局势正促使欧洲公司从更具战略性的角度重新考虑云计算提供商的选择。【原文：The CEO of OVHCloud , a leading European data centre provider that operates 43 facilities across four continents, said on Thursday that global trade tensions were making European companies rethink their choice of cloud provider from a more strategic perspective.】

item.title: 肯尼亚土地僵局向外资茶园发出警告
item.description: 在肯尼亚西部，一个英国人拥有的茶叶种植园与当地社区之间的纠纷已经闹得沸沸扬扬，这可能预示着茶叶生产商将面临动荡的时代，因为殖民时代的不公正待遇正引起越来越大的反弹。【原文：A dispute between a British-owned tea plantation and a local community in western Kenya has come to the boil in what could be a sign of turbulent times ahead for tea producers facing a growing backlash over colonial-era injustices.】

item.title: 投资者寻求审查澳大利亚的上市规则，称 James Hardie-AZEK 交易会造成损害
item.description: 一群投资者呼吁对澳大利亚的上市规则进行审查，声称允许公司在未经股东投票的情况下发行大量股票为收购提供资金是 "不合理的"。【原文：A group of investors has called for a review of Australia's listing rules, claiming it was "unreasonable" that companies were allowed to issue a large amount of shares to fund their acquisitions without a shareholder vote.】

item.title: 为什么日元是任何美日贸易争端中的错误赌注？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）希望日元兑美元走强的愿望几乎肯定会被纳入正在华盛顿举行的与日本的贸易谈判中，但分析人士说，任何转移货币的努力对双方来说都充满风险。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's desire for a stronger yen against the dollar is almost certain to figure into trade negotiations with Japan underway in Washington, but analysts say any effort to shift the currencies is fraught with risks for both sides.】

item.title: 受美国关税影响，英国半导体公司 Alphawave 放弃业绩预测
item.description: 英国半导体公司Alphawave IP Group周四表示，由于美国关税 "迅速发展的性质 "所带来的不确定性，该公司无法提供2025年或以后的财务预测。【原文：British semiconductor company Alphawave IP Group said on Thursday that it was unable to provide a financial forecast for 2025 or beyond due to the uncertainty stemming from the "rapidly developing nature" of U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 巴克莱向布鲁克菲尔德出售支付业务股份
item.description: 巴克莱银行周四表示，已将其英国支付部门的部分股权出售给布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management），结束了长达一年多的为零售商处理支付业务的努力。【原文：Barclays has sold part of its British payments unit to Brookfield Asset Management, the bank said on Thursday, ending a more than year-long effort to offload the business which processes payments for retailers.】

item.title: 法国阿托斯公司公布季度收入下降，但预示将获得更多客户订单
item.description: 本周四，Atos 公布第一季度收入下降，原因是英国的业务流程外包活动大幅减少，导致 2024 年的订单量减少。【原文：Atos reported a drop in first-quarter revenue on Thursday, hit by a lower order entry in 2024 due to a sharp reduction of business process outsourcing activities in Britain, but signalled more orders coming from clients.】

item.title: 爱马仕第一季度销售额增长 7%，略低于预期
item.description: 法国爱马仕公司（Hermes）将在美国提价，以完全抵消唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统关税政策带来的成本，该公司表示，其公布的第一季度销售额低于市场预期，罕见地表现出疲软态势。【原文：France's Hermes will carry out price hikes in the United States to fully offset the costs from President Donald Trump's tariff policies, the company said, as it posted first-quarter sales below market expectations in a rare show of weakness.】

item.title: 消息人士称，受制裁的俄罗斯北极地区石油对中国的出口量将在四月份增加
item.description: 分析公司Vortexa和两位俄罗斯石油贸易商称，在卖方提供大幅折扣和使用非认可油轮装运以对抗美国禁运之后，俄罗斯4月份对中国的北极石油出口量将大幅上升。【原文：Russia's exports of Arctic oil to China are set to rise sharply in April after sellers offered wide discounts and shipment on non-sanctioned tankers to counter a U.S. embargo, analytics firm Vortexa and two Russian oil traders said.】

item.title: 台积电第一季度利润大增 60%，超出预期
item.description: 由于受益于人工智能应用领域对半导体的需求激增，全球最大的合约芯片制造商台积电周四公布的第一季度净利润大幅增长 60%，超出市场预期。【原文：TSMC , the world's largest contract chipmaker, posted a 60% jump in first-quarter net profit on Thursday, beating market forecasts as it benefited from surging demand for semiconductors used in artificial intelligence applications.】
